title: Supreme Court Rules That Lindsey Graham Must Testify in Georgia Inquiry
description: The courtâ€™s order said the questioning allowed by lower courts was limited and subject to appropriate safeguards.
media:credit: Juan Diego Reyes for The New York Times
media:description: The Supreme Court said that Senator Lindsey Graham had been afforded substantial protections by lower courts, which had ruled that he did not have to testify on subjects related to his official duties.
